summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of West Fifty-first Street from Fifteenth Avenue N.W. to Seventeenth Avenue N.W. in the City of Seattle, by constructing a sewer under Ordinance No. 16792, creating Local Improvement District No. 1569 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
